mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_code FROM reservation r WHERE r.reservation_status = 'RESERVED' AND r.canceled_at IS NULL AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM message_send_history h WHERE h.stage_code = #{stageCode} AND h.reservation_code = r.reservation_code )

SELECT r.reservation_code FROM reservation r WHERE r.reservation_status = 'CANCELED' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM message_send_history h WHERE h.stage_code = #{stageCode} AND h.reservation_code = r.reservation_code )

SELECT r.reservation_code FROM reservation r WHERE r.reservation_status = 'NO_SHOW' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM message_send_history h WHERE h.stage_code = #{stageCode} AND h.reservation_code = r.reservation_code )
SELECT s.stay_code FROM stay s WHERE s.actual_checkin_at IS NOT NULL AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM message_send_history h WHERE h.stage_code = #{stageCode} AND h.stay_code = s.stay_code )
SELECT s.stay_code FROM stay s WHERE s.actual_checkout_at IS NOT NULL AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM message_send_history h WHERE h.stage_code = #{stageCode} AND h.stay_code = s.stay_code )
